channel.title: Custom item not held in hand
channel.description:
Ive made 2 custom swords and both of them when I wield them, they show in the hand but when i attack the swords dont move and the players hand attack rather than the sword. The hits are from the sword and stuff but the sword doenst have animation nor can it be held in the players hand.
Im not so sure wat would be causing this problem. It happens to both of my custom swords.
Help Please?

item.title: Custom item not held in hand
item.dc:creator: @robbystyles2 robbystyles2
item.description:
@robbystyles2 wrote:

ok thanks anyways

Read full topic

item.title: Custom item not held in hand
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“robbystyles2, post:3, topic:392721”]its delta i believe and i did edit a file with the animations. It still doesnt work o and some other custom which wasnt in my source it works. So im not sure wat it could be maybe somethin with the .dat file(model)?[/quote]Doubting it is that.

I don’t deal with delta enough to know how to help you sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom item not held in hand
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You have to add the animation to a server file. If it’s PI then it would be like combatassistant.java if I remember correctly.

Read full topic
